# ReadMe Generator

  ##Table of Contents

  * Project Description - (#description)

  * Installation - (#installation)

  * Usage - (#usage)

  * Contribution - (#contribution)

  * Testing - (#testing)

  * Questions - (#questions)


  ## Project Description
  The goal of this project is to create a ReadMe Generator using node.js. All commands must be input via the console, and then upon completion a readme is generated in MD format.

  ## Installation 
  npm i

  ## Usage 
  This repo is utilizing basic functionality. Please visit in the future for more advanced functionality and options.
  [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Apache_2.0-blue.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/Apache-2.0)
  

  ## Contribution
  This repo is currently not accepting contributions

  ## Testing
  npm test
